price: 他们说：“我们丢失了国王的〔酒〕杯；谁拿它来还，给谁－驮粮食，我是保证人。”
arabic: قَالُواْ نَفۡقِدُ صُوَاعَ ٱلۡمَلِكِ وَلِمَن جَآءَ بِهِۦ حِمۡلُ بَعِيرٖ وَأَنَا۠ بِهِۦ زَعِيمٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū nafqidu ṣuwāʿa al-maliki waliman jāa bihi ḥim'lu baʿīrin wa-anā bihi zaʿīmun
